body.p: Granted these are from the time of different screensizes and at least seven years old but I worked with what I had at a public university to create instructions for graduate students to aid in formatting and submission of electronic theses and disserations (ETD). All the following videoes were produced with Camtasia screen capture software.

The proceeding video tutorial assists students with understanding how to sign-up for an account with the university's institutional repository so the student can submit the ETD (explained in another video).
This next video assists students who may not be familiar with Microsoft Word with how to generate a table of contents automatically.

This last video example assists students with their signature page, which is an important page showing the sign-off for students' theses or dissertations. This video also demonstrates how I templated the signature page as a form to more easily help students incorporate it without mistakes.
